rubric.description: Respond to the customer within 1 business day. Express empathy and intent to resolve.
rubric.example_message: Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear about the issue — I’ll make sure we get this taken care of for you.

rubric.description: Request necessary information like order number and reason for refund.
rubric.example_message: Could you share your order number and a brief summary of the issue so we can get started?

rubric.description: Check if the order qualifies for a refund as per company policy.
rubric.example_message: This qualifies for a refund and I’ve submitted the request. You can expect an update within 24 hours.

rubric.description: Clearly communicate refund timeline, method, and any required actions to the customer.
rubric.example_message: We’ll issue the refund to your original payment method within 3–5 business days.

rubric.description: Notify the customer about major steps in the refund process.
rubric.example_message: We’ve completed the refund and you should see it reflected in your account soon.

rubric.description: Send confirmation of the processed refund including amount and timing.
rubric.example_message: Your refund of $42.95 has been issued. It should appear on your statement within 3–5 business days.
